channel.title: SigNoz
channel.description: SigNoz is an open-source observability tool to help you find issues in your deployed applications & solve them quickly. It provides logs, metrics, and traces under a single pane of glass. Built with ClickHouse as datastore, it is designed to handle enterprise scale.
channel.item: https://signoz.io/blog/can-you-have-a-career-in-node-without-observability Can you have a career in Node without knowing Observability? https://signoz.io/blog/can-you-have-a-career-in-node-without-observability undefined Sat, 23 Sep 2023 00:00:00 GMT address@yoursite.com (SigNoz Inc) nodejavascriptopentelemetry
